General.Name: ZJMI Environmental Energy Co. Ltd.
General.Description: ZJMI Environmental Energy Co., Ltd. engages in the coal circulation and cogeneration businesses. It provides steam; electricity, including coal-fired, biomass, and sludge power generation; and compressed air, as well as sludge disposal and other services. The company was founded in 1950 and is based in Hangzhou, China. ZJMI Environmental Energy Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Wuchan Zhongda Group Co.,Ltd.
